roles.name: roles/container.nodeServiceAgent
roles.title: [Deprecated] Kubernetes Engine Node Service Agent
roles.description: Minimal set of permission required by a GKE node to support standard capabilities such as logging and monitoring export, and image pulls.

roles.name: roles/container.defaultNodeServiceAccount
roles.title: Kubernetes Engine Default Node Service Account
roles.description: Least privilege role to use as the default service account for GKE Nodes.
